Premium DDOS Protected HostingcPanel/DirectAdminLitespeed24/7 Support35% OFF

FREE TRANSFER OF YOUR WEBSITE INCLUDED

Hello!

Sharedspace provides premium, feature rich, DDos Protected cPanel and DirectAdmin hosting ensuring your sites have a super smooth experience. Through the combination of CloudLinux, Litespeed web server and SSD drives we offer unparalleled performance for your website no matter the size! If you are looking for a fast, reliable and caring hosting provider then look no further than Sharedspace!

Why host with us?:


  • Latest version of CloudLinux
  • Litespeed webserver with LSCache
  • Nvme SSD Drives
  • All Accounts backed up to secure cloud storage with a 30 day rolling retention and a further monthly backup taken once a month and held for 6 months!
  • Softaculous AutoInstaller
  • MariaDB Database server for cPanel
  • MYSQL Database for DirectAdmin
  • FREE SSL Certificates via LetsEncrypt for cPanel & DirectAdmin
  • Multi PHP Selector
  • 30 Day moneyback guarantee
  • 24/7 Support
  • 30 Minute support ticket response time

PROMOTION: This week we are offering 25% off! Simply use the code JANUARY35 to claim 35% off your hosting. This is applicable to all billing cycles. Annual has 2 months included free in the price so save even more by paying annually!

Customer Reviews:

View our customer reviews on TrustPilot.com: https://www.trustpilot.com/review/sharedspace.io?

5*: I was trying to sign up on their shared plan on annual term (was getting an amazing deal on it) and my Credit card was getting declined continuously, so i started a live chat session with the support and they tried their BEST to help me out, i ultimately used a different CC for purchase but this showed me their support level.
Working out really good so far atleast.

5*: I've only been with them for a few months, but so far I am impressed. Sharedspace sales and support have both answered my questions quickly. The hosting appears to be very good, uptime excellent. I am a happy customer.

Frequently asked questions:

Q: How quick will my account be setup?
A: As soon as payment has been received

Q: My order was marked as fraud, what do I do?
A: We use Fraudlabs for our fraud checking. Occasionally however it does get it wrong. Get in touch with us and we'll assist with your order

Q: Can I use all my allocated resources
A: Yes definitely!

We look forward to working with you! If you have any questions please do get in touch with us and we'll be happy to assist! Contact us via sales@sharedspace.io or via our contact form through WHMCS! Livechat also available on the website for any presales questions!
